content: **knitted set of trousers and hat for baby in drops merino extra fine size premature to 4 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the winter baby pants pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-071-by yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- ***hat*** **size** <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 3/4 years fits head circumference in cm approx 28/30 - 32/34 - 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 48/50 50/52 cm fits head circumference in inches 11 /11 3/4 13 3/8 /15 15 3/4 /16 1/2 16 1/2 /17 1/4 17 1/4 / 18 19 /19 3/4 19 3/4 /20 1/2 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 50-50-50-50 50-100 g color 01 off white **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm = us 4 drops double pointed needles size 4 mm = us 6 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b33-12-a-winter-baby-pants
